word: H2167 - זָמַר - zâmar - zaw-mar' - Give praise

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - கீர்த்தனம்பண்ணு, போற்றிப்பாடு, துதி, துதித்துப்பாடு, பாடு
to sing, to sing praise, to make music

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root (perhaps identical with H2168 through the idea of striking with the fingers); properly to touch the strings or parts of a musical instrument, that is, play upon it; to make music, accompanied by the voice; hence to celebrate in song and music: - give praise, sing forth praises, psalms.
Cognate: H2158, H2167, H2172, H2176, H4210
